original_title: Undercover Bike Cop: The Powder Room
overview: Violet is in need of some ZATS! (A white powdered substance that enhances the senses once it is consumed). She heads to Uri who shows her what all the fuss is about the drug.
tagline: Once you smell my shit, you'll be addicted just like that!
title: Undercover Bike Cop: The Powder Room
